Articles.Content: i have no prefixes and i wand to release a mod but the forum is not giving me options. Plz help;.;

This sounds like a job for the forum forum! (So, moved.) If you are posting in the proper sub-forum, there will be a little prefix menu on the upper left of the screen when you are composing the first post. If you're not in the right sub-forum, there is no such menu, or it won't have the options you expect.

No, it just has no prefix thingy altogether and when i try to post it says i need a prefix, even though there is no prefix tab.
Are you on a mobile device? If so, I'm told there's a button at the top of the screen to get the desktop version to display with the options you're looking for.

Nope, Using a Mac and i've tried safari and chrome with no avail.
